Verses: 1 allelooyaa, Karththarukkup Pudhuppaattaip Paatdungal; Parisuththavaangalin Sabaiyile Avarudaiya Thudhi Vilanguvadhaaga.
2 isravel Thannai Undaakkinavaril Magizhavum, Seeyon Kumaarar Thangal Raajaavil Kalikooravungadavargal.
3 avarudaiya Naamaththai Nadanaththode Thudhiththu, Thamburinaalum Kinnaraththinaalum Avaraik Keerththanampannakkadavargal.
4 karththar Thammudaiya Janaththinmel Piriyam Vaikkiraar; Saandhagunamullavargalai Ratchippinaal Alangarippaar.
5 parisuththavaangal Magimaiyode Kalikoorndhu, Thangal Padukkaigalinmel Gembeerippaargal.
7 avargaludaiya Raajaakkalaich Sangiligalaalum, Avargaludaiya Menmakkalai Iruppu Vilangugalaalum Kattavum, Ezhudhappatta Niyaayaththeerppai Avargalperil Seluththavum,
8 avargal Vaayil Karththarai Uyarththum Thudhiyum, Avargal Kaiyil Irupuramum Karukkulla Pattayamum Irukkum.
9 indhak Ganam Avarudaiya Parisuththavaangal Yaavarukkum Undaagum. (allelooyaa.)
